title: The Anthony Cumia Show 2015-07-16 Steven Crowder Jim Norton
description:
*** CAUTION: 100% UNCENSORED CONTENT!!! ***

-NOT FOR VIEWING BY CHILDREN OR THE FAINT OF HEART-

Fresh off his "separation" from SiriusXM, Anthony Cumia, formerly of The Opie and Anthony Show launches his live, uncensored HD video webcast at AnthonyCumia.com Monday-Thursday 4pm-6pm EST. Current events, politics, news and anything can and will be discussed with celebrity guests and comedians stopping by as well. This show is not for those who are inclined to be "politically correct" and will contain boundary-pushing language and topics. Proceed with caution...

Guests: Steven Crowder, Jim Norton

Episode 197 "Walking on Antshells": Rocking the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Paulie WalnutsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ once again, Anthony talks about last nightÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s roast of Big Jay, the shooting news out of Chattanooga, the callers weigh in with their thoughts, and we hear parts of AntÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s set from last night as he defends bombing accusations. Steven Crowder joins via Skype to talk about stand-up comedy, language policing differing in America and Canada, freedom of expression, the hypocrisy of tolerance, the Ã¢â‚¬Å“courageÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ of Bruce/Caitlyn Jenner versus other sports stars, getting bullied for comments, comparing tragedies, walking the line of mean and funny, and Ann Coulter. Ant takes it back to the phones where Jim Norton calls to joke about being cut from Trainwreck, they critique AntÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s performance on Big JayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s roast, talk about writing roast material, Chip brags about his roasting skills, and they briefly talk about the new studio as well as the shooting in Chattanooga. After Ant rants about what bombing means, we see a video of the new studio, he chats with the callers once again about the roast, talks about the upcoming live show from Comic-Con in Tampa, William Ã¢â‚¬Å“BillÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Shatner, Major Garrett versus Obama, a Princess Leia doll causing debate, and Marilyn MosbyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s shitty family. Our psychic friend Ant then shows us a video of a shooting drone, one of a dumb ass robber, plays the video of Big Jay handling that asshole heckler, he once again hears it about his roast appearance, gets some last digs in on poor little Joe DeRosa, and we watch Caitlyn Jenner accepting an award at the ESPYÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s.
